settings.subheading: 10 year anniversary sale discount up to -70%

settings.text:
At Lisa & Peter London, we are already embracing the brand-new autumn collection. We make sure to always provide high-quality products and stylish choices, so you can step into the season looking your best in the latest trends.

Browse our products below and explore the full collections.

settings.title: Meet Pieter & Lisa
settings.text:
At Lisa & Peter London, everything starts with passion for fashion. From a young age, Pieter and Lisa shared a lifelong love for style and creativity. Both studied Fashion Design and Business before building their careers in the industry. After working for different companies, they came together as a couple and decided to create something of their own.

Now, more than 10 years later, they run their store with countless happy clients and inspiring projects. Their mission has always been clear: to stay ahead of new trends, deliver high-quality pieces, and offer a truly personal approach. For Pieter and Lisa, it’s about more than fashion — it’s about making every customer feel seen, valued, and stylish in their own unique way.

settings.testimonial: “The order arrived beautifully packaged and in perfect condition. You can really feel the quality of the fabric.”
settings.author: Emma J.

settings.testimonial: “Great service from Lisa & Peter London. The clothes fit perfectly and the personal touch really makes a difference.”
settings.author: Claire W.

settings.testimonial: “I’m very impressed with the attention to detail. Everything came neatly wrapped, smelling fresh and ready to wear.”
settings.author: Sarah M.

settings.testimonial: “Fantastic experience! The items are high quality and you can tell the store genuinely cares about its customers.”
settings.author: Olivia R.

settings.testimonial: “My package arrived safely and beautifully presented. Lisa & Peter London make online shopping feel truly personal.”
settings.author: Helen P.
